Prince Vasíli was not a man who deliberately thought out his plans.
Prince Vasíli did not think of injuring anyone for his own advantage.
Prince Vasíli was a man of the world who had got on and to whom getting on had become a habit.
Schemes and devices formed the whole interest of Prince Vasíli's life.
Schemes and devices were constantly shaping themselves in Prince Vasíli's mind.
Schemes and devices arose from the circumstances and persons Prince Vasíli met.
Prince Vasíli had dozens of plans in his mind, some only beginning to form, some approaching achievement, and some in course of disintegration.
Prince Vasíli did not think to himself, "This man now has influence, I must gain his confidence and friendship and through him obtain a special grant.".
Prince Vasíli did not think to himself, "Pierre is a rich man, I must entice him to marry my daughter and lend me the forty thousand rubles I need.".
When Prince Vasíli came across a man of position, his instinct told him that the man could be useful.
Prince Vasíli took the first opportunity to gain the man's confidence.
Prince Vasíli took the first opportunity to flatter the man.
Prince Vasíli took the first opportunity to become intimate with the man.
Prince Vasíli took the first opportunity to make his request to the man.
Prince Vasíli had Pierre at hand in Moscow.
Prince Vasíli procured for Pierre an appointment as Gentleman of the Bedchamber.
The appointment as Gentleman of the Bedchamber conferred the status of Councilor of State.
Prince Vasíli insisted that Pierre accompany Prince Vasíli to Petersburg.
Prince Vasíli insisted that Pierre stay at Prince Vasíli's house.
Prince Vasíli did everything to get Pierre to marry Prince Vasíli's daughter.

If Prince Vasíli had thought out his plans beforehand, he could not have been so natural and shown such unaffected familiarity in intercourse with everybody both above and below him in social standing.
Something always drew Prince Vasíli toward those richer and more powerful than himself.
Prince Vasíli had a rare skill in seizing the most opportune moment for making use of people.
